mainImageTips: Commodity page main picture, you can upload multiple pictures at a time, up to 1 piece. It is recommended that the picture width is 1600px or more
priceStockInputPlaceholder: Please separate each option with a comma
releaseSuccess: The item has been submitted, please view the 'release', 'publish failed' or 'online product'!
settingShoppingFeeValidate: Please complete the setting of international shipping first
PleaseSelectTheCountryBeforeSaving: Please select the country to save
productSizeHintOfSizeNumber: This item must be at least two sizes to save
sizeTableRemarkStep1: Column name: Fill in the size name, you can customize
sizeTableRemarkStep2: Live Name: Fill in the measurement site, you must select a fill in the 'measurement site' {click} provided by the system.
sizeTableRemarkStep3: The size table defaults to "cm" as units, in addition to the column name, the cell outside the list can only fill in the numbers, uppercase letters, decisions, "-", "/", and spaces
sizeTableRemarkStep4: The first cell of the size table must be filled in "size"
sizeTableRemarkStep5: Shoe size default uses European code, view
sizeTableRemarkStep6: Set as a template size table
vovaProductReleaseNotes: Explanation: Because the VOVO platform processes the release product is slow, it is expected to be more than 3 hours.
optionsUploadHint: Tip: Goods for clothing and footwear must upload the size property, otherwise you can not upload, other categories are non-required, but will not fill in the product information, affecting the product is sold! ! !
validationImagePublishHint: The minimum image size is 300x300 pixels, the best image size is 700x700 pixels
brandPostHint: There is a brand logo or a brand related picture, title and description. Need to have a newspaper name
plsSelectCorrectOffer: Please select the correct picture number
syncHint: Currently selected items, some items have not been bound to the store, please release to the VOVA platform and perform synchronization operations.
